# uv-field

## Properties

| Property       | Attribute       | Description                                                   | Type     | Default |
| -------------- | --------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ------- |
| `classLabel`   | `class-label`   | (optional) The class css to apply to the label of the field.  | `string` | `''`    |
| `classMessage` | `class-message` | (optional) The class css to apply to the mesage of the field. | `string` | `''`    |
| `label`        | `label`         | (optional) The label of the field.                            | `string` | `''`    |
| `message`      | `message`       | (optional) The mesage of the field.                           | `string` | `''`    |
